text: A staple for beginners learning any language is being able to say “what will you do today?”.小明：你今天会做什么？王刚：我今天会很忙，我会去看我的奶奶。你呢？小明：今天我不忙，我会去看电影。王刚：你明天会做什么？小明：明天我会学习。你呢？王刚：明天我会去看我的姥爷。小明：What will you do today?王刚：I am busy today. I will go to see my grandmother. How about you?小明：I am not busy today, I will go to see a movie.王刚：What will you do tomorrow?小明：I will study tomorrow. How about you?王刚：I will go to see my grandfather tomorrow.1 – 王刚今天忙不忙？a. 忙b. 不忙2 – 小明今天会做什么？a. 他会看足球比赛b. 他会买东西c. 他会玩篮球d. 他会看电影1. a2. dReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
